quotes.quote: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Do not be satisfied with the stories that come before you. Unfold your own myth.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Difficulties in your life do not come to destroy you but to help you realize your hidden potential and power.
quotes.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Success is when your signature becomes an autograph.
quotes.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: It's fine to celebrate success, but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Not all storms come to disrupt your life. Some come to clear your path.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Patience is the key to paradise.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

quotes.quote: The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

quotes.quote: A person’s true wealth is the good he does in this world.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning think of what a privilege it is to be alive, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Honesty is a very expensive gift. Don’t expect it from cheap people.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Dummy quote
quotes.author: Dummy Author
